quote: You sleep okay, sweetie?” “Miss my teddy,” Billie replied. Personally, I thought Detective Mitch Lawson was far superior to a tiny pink teddy bear but I wasn’t six years old.
quote_letters: YOU SLEEP OKAY SWEETIE MISS MY TEDDY BILLIE REPLIED PERSONALLY I THOUGHT DETECTIVE MITCH LAWSON WAS FAR SUPERIOR TO A TINY PINK TEDDY BEAR BUT I WASNT SIX YEARS OLD
